rank.name: Rank command
rank.description: View current rankings for voice or text activity

rank_history.name: Rank History command
rank_history.description: View historical rankings for voice or text activity
rank_history.invalid_year: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** You cannot view rankings from past years.
rank_history.invalid_month: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** You cannot view rankings from future months.
rank_history.week_requires_month_and_week: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Please select both month and week for weekly rankings.
rank_history.invalid_week: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Week {{maxWeeks}} does not exist for the selected month.
rank_history.select_week: Please select a week for month {{month}}
rank_history.timeout: Selection timed out. Please try again.

confession.name: Confession command
confession.description: Send an anonymous confession to a server
confession.server_id_description: The ID of the server to send confession to
confession.prefix_not_supported: **{{icon}} | {{author}}, ** This command only works with slash commands. Please use /confession
confession.success: **{{icon}} | Confession submitted successfully! Your confession number is #{{confession_number}}**
confession.approved_success: **{{icon}} | Confession {{confession_id}} has been approved and posted.**
confession.no_content: **{{icon}} | No confession content provided. Please try again.**
confession.timeout: **{{icon}} | Confession timed out. Please try again.**

errors.server_not_found: **{{icon}} | Server not found or confession not configured.**

event_invite.name: Event Invite command
event_invite.example: Create a managed invite link for your event

leaderboard.description: View invite leaderboard for this server

invites_snapshot.name: Invites Snapshot command
invites_snapshot.description: Take a snapshot of current invite counts
